turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hey there, how can i help you today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. Are you able to assist me by placing an order at a new pizzeria called Bella Luna?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: i sure can. what would u like to order from bella luna?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Want to get two large pies. I want one to have broccoli, the other to have onions, and both of them need to be extra cheese.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sorry, it doesn't look like they have broccoli. did you want something else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh, that's a shame. Do they have tomatoes?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: they sure do. did you want regular or sun dried?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: the total for 2 large pizzas, 1 with tomatoes, 1 with onions, both with extra cheese comes out to $25.33.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you want me to place the order now?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, i've submitted your order, it'll be ready for pick up in 35 mins.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you need my assistance with anything else?
